name: Pontui
description:
"Pontui guides you through a world of unsolved ancient mysteries. After befriending a giant robot-esque being you work together to get to the bottom of where it came from and what has happened to its kind. Solve puzzles by using your own abilities and those of your new companion to unravel the buried stories that lie beyond the world that you are familiar with."

Pontui was developed over 6 month as a solo game project for university.

Work In Progress
- some assets not final
- environment not final
- may contain bugs

Planned features:
- story elements
- more puzzles

Have fun playing!

Want to give some feedback? Leave a comment or fill out this questionnaire: https://forms.gle/6D5JyjhpbCs81FNM8
